title: Martin Kihn on self-awareness
dc:creator: Michael Driscoll
description:
When Thales was asked what was difficult, he said, ‘To know oneself.’ And what was easy, ‘To advise another.’ Martin Kihn, House of Lies

The post Martin Kihn on self-awareness appeared first on m. e. driscoll.

When Thales was asked what was difficult, he said, ‘To know oneself.’ And what was easy, ‘To advise another.’

Martin Kihn, House of Lies
